parameters: \n<Marion>Sigh. Dealing with the remnants of the monsters isn't easy.

\n<Marion>The numbers are definitely decreasing, but we're still
seeing a lot of monster-related incidents. It's laughable.
No, it's not funny at all.

\n<Marion>The only being capable of defeating the monsters, the
modified girl Makina.

\n<Marion>When Makina was defeated by the primordial monster, the Ex-
Demon, I was really worried...

\n<Marion>But she gradually regained her strength and succeeded in her
revenge. Now no new monsters will be born.

\n<Marion>There are still too many monster stragglers. How long is it
going to take to deal with all of them?
\n<Marion>Well, that \c[27]airhead lady\C[0] is doing her best too...
\n<Marion>Maybe it's time for her to start working for real.
\n<Marion>Oh, speak of the devil. Or should I say, speak of the fool.
\n<Marion>Eury, I have a new mission for you.
\n<Eury>Here it comes! I'm ready for anything!

\n<Marion>The area has seen a lot of monster damage. Consequently, the
public order in the city has deteriorated.

\n<Marion>Eury, I want you to use Tengeki Street as your base of
operations to exterminate monsters and resolve any troubles.
\n<Eury>Finally! I get to undertake a mission all by myself!

\n<Marion>Yes. This time you won't be accompanied by Makina, the
senior modified girl.

\n<Marion>...I'm worried about you making a blunder without anyone to
protect you.
\n<Eury>I won't make any blunders! Well then, I'll be off now!

\n<Marion>She's gone. She would have been faster if she used the pod
to teleport.

\n<Marion>Oh well. She may be a klutz and a fool, but she's quick on
her feet.
\n<Makina>Marion. Eury just rushed out of here. What happened?

\n<Makina>You're sending Eury to Tengeki Street alone? Isn't that
dangerous?

\n<Makina>That city's public order is too poor. What if something
happens to Eury?
\n<Makina>She's a modified girl too. She can't attack humans.\C[2]

\n<Makina>You know that, Marion. The most terrifying thing isn't
monsters; it's humans.

\n<Marion>That's not a problem. Tengeki Street has seen widespread use
of the \C[27]Sexaroids\C[0] I created.

\n<Marion>Androids for sex. That's why we've been able to control the
men's sexual desires.

\n<Marion>Before I flooded the market with Sexaroids using drones, sex
crimes were rampant.

\n<Marion>Well, it's understandable given the monster damage, but
those guys are really scum.

\n<Marion>(Besides, there's the fact that those humans who betrayed us
for the monsters lusted after Makina...)
\n<Marion>(I know this fact, but I haven't told Makina...)

\n<Marion>Nothing. Anyway, men are idiots, whether it's with humans or
machines, they can objectify them sexually just the same.
\n<Makina>I see... Well, as long as that's the case.

\n<Marion>Ugh, there's a nasty number of monster signals popping up.
We need to deal with this quickly or it's going to be bad.
\n<Marion>Sigh. Cleaning up these monster remnants is no easy task.

\n<Marion>The numbers are definitely decreasing, but we're still
seeing a ridiculous amount of monster damage. It's
laughable. No, it's not laughable at all.

\n<Marion>The only being capable of defeating monsters, the modified
girl Makina.

\n<Marion>When Makina lost to the primordial monster, the Ex-Demon, I
panicked, but...

\n<Marion>She gradually regained her strength and successfully took
her revenge. Now no new monsters will be born.

\n<Marion>There are still too many monster remnants. How long is it
going to take to deal with all of this?

\n<Marion>Well, Eury, the second modified girl, is also doing her
best...

\n<Marion>Maybe it's about time for that daydreaming lady to start
moving for real.
\n<Marion>Oh, speak of the devil... I mean, shadow.
\n<Marion>By the way, Eury, I have a new mission for you.
\n<Eury>Here it comes! I'm ready for anything!
\n<Marion>You're going to Tengeki Street by yourself.
\n<Eury>Tengeki Street? Could it be... that place...!?
\n<Eury>This is the first time I've heard of it.
\n<Marion>No need to pretend like you have prior information.

\n<Marion>The area has been suffering from a lot of monster damage.
Consequently, the town's public order has also deteriorated.

\n<Marion>I want you to use Tengeki Street as your base of operations
and dedicate yourself to monster extermination and resolving
troubles.
\n<Eury>Finally! I get to undertake a mission all by myself!

\n<Marion>Yes. This time you won't be accompanied by Makina, the
senior modified girl.

\n<Marion>...I'm worried about you making a blunder without anyone
there to protect you.

\n<Eury>I won't make any blunders! Well then, I'll be off right
away!

\n<Marion>She's gone. She'd get there faster if she used the pod for
transport instead of walking.

\n<Marion>Whatever. She may be clumsy and silly, but she's fast on her
feet.
\n<Marion>Clumsy and silly though she may be.
\n<Makina>Marion. Eury just rushed out of here. What happened?
\n<Makina>Eury is going to Tengeki Street alone? Isn't that dangerous?

\n<Makina>That town has terrible public order. What if something
happens to Eury?
\n<Makina>She's a modified girl too. She can't attack humans.

\n<Makina>You know that too, Marion. The most terrifying thing isn't
monsters; it's humans.

\n<Marion>That's not a problem. Tengeki Street has been flooded with
Sexaroids that I created.

\n<Marion>Androids made for sex. That's why I can control the sexual
desires of men.

\n<Marion>Until I sent a flood of Sexaroids with my drones, there used
to be endless sexual crimes.

\n<Marion>Well, it's no surprise given the monster damage and the
state of things, but really, it's just trashy.
\n<Makina>...Do men really get satisfied with those, Sexaroids?

\n<Marion>(Besides, there's the fact that humans who turned to the
monster side en masse lusted after Makina at that time.)
\n<Marion>(The fact that I know this. I haven't told Makina though...)

\n<Marion>It's nothing. Anyway, men are stupid; whether it's a human
or a machine, they can make either into a sexual object.
\n<Makina>I see... If that's the case, then good.
Shall we go to the place where the monster appeared?
